alert.note: Alert for Clark; Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Jefferson; Scott; Washington (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 10:25AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, Clark, Floyd, Scott, Washington, Harrison, Crawford, Oldham, Meade, Jefferson, Hardin, Bullitt, Trimble and Breckinridge Counties through 1130 AM EST/1030 AM CST/... At 1024 AM EST/924 AM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Salem to 7 miles north of Hardinsburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Scottsburg around 1040 AM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Brandenburg, Madison, Fairdale, Shepherdsville, Hollyvilla, South Park View, Pioneer Village, Hollow Creek, Spring Mill, Minor Lane Heights and Highview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clark; Crawford; Floyd; Harrison; Jefferson; Scott; Washington
